message: Let's be realistic, Alice. I rejected your offer last round, so you know I'm serious about getting a better deal.  This is my counter-offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, the clock is ticking and the value is decreasing.  I'm compromising further, but this is my final offer.
I'm not budging much, since the inflation only hurts you. Last chance before I take an even harder stance.
